modules.name: Data.Incremental
modules.comments:
Incremental computation, based on

> "A Theory of Changes for Higher-Order Languages" by
> Cai, Gairrusso, Rendel and Ostermann.

This module also defines a HOAS-style interface for working with
function changes.

declarations.comments:
A "change structure" on `a` consists of a monoid `d` of changes, together with
diff and patch functions.
declarations.title: ChangeStructure

declarations.comments:
A type level function which maps a type to the type of its change structure.

Uniqueness of instances makes the coercions `fromChange` and `toChange` safe,
since the functional dependency makes the change structure type unique.
declarations.title: Change

declarations.comments:
A term paired with its rate of change.

We can think of these modified terms as conceptually similar to dual numbers.
declarations.title: D1

declarations.comments: Create a function which applies a patch to its input
declarations.title: applyPatch

declarations.comments:
A `Group` is a `Monoid` with inverses.

Laws:

- _Left inverse_: `inverse x <> x = mempty`
- _Right inverse_: `x <> inverse x = mempty`
declarations.title: Group

declarations.comments:
An `Abelian` group is a `Group` whose `append` operation also satisfies the
_commutativity law_:

- _Commutativity_ `x <> y = y <> x`
declarations.title: Abelian

declarations.comments: A change structure for any abelian group.
declarations.title: WrappedAbelian

modules.name: Data.Incremental.Map
modules.comments: A change structure for maps, and helper functions.

declarations.comments: A change structure for `Map` which tracks changes for each key.
declarations.title: WrappedMap

declarations.comments: A change for a single key is an addition, removal, or update.
declarations.title: MapChange

declarations.comments: A change for each possible key.
declarations.title: MapChanges

declarations.comments: Update a single key by applying a function.
declarations.title: key

declarations.comments: Update every key by applying a function.
declarations.title: each
